## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Motivation / Use Case

Why would this feature be useful? What problem does it solve?

## Domain Context

How does this feature relate to IEEE 1588/PTP behavior or the domain model?
- Which part of the spec does this address?
- What domain concepts would be involved? (e.g., new port state, BMCA behavior, profile support, etc.)

## Proposed Approach (Optional)

If you have ideas about how this could be implemented:
- Which objects or collaborators would be involved?
- How would this fit into the current architecture?
- Are there any design trade-offs to consider?
- How would it be tested?

## Alternatives Considered (Optional)

What other approaches could address this need?

## Additional Context

Any other context, code examples, or references:
- Links to IEEE 1588 spec sections
- Examples from other PTP implementations
- Related issues or discussions
